data.title: The Walking Dead
data.bio: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

data.title: Prison Break
data.bio: Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man is sent to death row and his only hope is his brother, who makes it his mission to deliberately get himself sent to the same prison in order to break the both of them out, from the inside.
data.directors: Paul T. Scheuring, Paul T. Scheuring

data.title: Avatar
data.bio: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

data.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
data.bio: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the depths of space by the magical board game they are playing.

data.title: The Ice Road
data.bio: After a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada, a ‘big-rig’ ice road driver must lead an impossible rescue mission over a frozen ocean to save the trapped miners.

data.title: Forrest Gump
data.bio: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

data.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
data.bio: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

data.title: Inception
data.bio: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

data.title: Interstellar
data.bio: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

data.title: World War Z
data.bio: Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop a zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments and threatens to destroy humanity itself.

data.title: Dunkirk
data.bio: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

data.title: Titanic
data.bio: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

data.title: Léon: The Professiona
data.bio: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

data.title: Instant Family
data.bio: A couple find themselves in over their heads when they foster three children

data.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
data.bio: The adventures of a 12 year old who is fresh out of elementary and transitions to middle school, where he has to learn the consequences and responsibility to survive the year.

data.title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
data.bio: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

data.title: The Intouchables
data.bio: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

data.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
data.bio: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.
